collectMessagesNotice: Set this to true, if you want to save all user messages to the Supabase database, see `docs/messages.md` for more information.

credentials.important: BEFORE STARTING THE BOT, PLEASE PUT ALL YOUR OPENAI KEYS HERE LIKE BELOW.

error.channel: discord channel id, where to send error messages
error.guild: discord guild id, where to send error messages

openai.key: base openai key, used for moderation endpoint and finetuned models
